title: 6.15 CRASH! put in low priority for 5 Games! lost LP
body:
I was going into a game and the loading screen had mine stuck at 0% while everyone was at 100.
I tried to reconnect but my team had done a remake. I lost LP and am now in a low priority queue for 5 Games.

It is unfair as the server was having issues with the current patch, will I be able to get bans removed and LP back? 
I sure as hell don't wanna rough it out to climb and spend 20mins waiting to get into a game.

{{champion:412}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
